channel.title: 317 Delta Problem
channel.description:
So this has never been a problem before until now..i got a new source and client and wanted to add an npc model and new item models..I added them correctly but they are invisible on my server.
They do show there names and I can click on them and equip the items..and the npc is on the map, but i cant see anything?
Anyone know why?

item.title: 317 Delta Problem
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

Alright will do…although i tried doing ::add model ::addmodel ingame nothing worked…

Didn’t try doing just normal addmodel without ::(rare occasion to see that)

But I will see what I can do :S

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Delta Problem
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Thanks, post:3, topic:439116”]Yep
Yep
Nope as my source is a clean base with almost no commands on it(until I added some), but if you have a add model command that would be great…otherwise I will look around.
Yep[/quote]
the command is client sided, it should be in your client class, look for something like add model, addmodels something simular, and do the command ingame.
Some commands require you to add the model id like, ::add model 2545
some don’t need “::”
take a look in your client class CLIENT SIDED and try some things out

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Delta Problem
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Did you add the models itself in the right folder in you client?
Are they in the right extension format as your others?
Did you add them ingame with the addmodel command?
Did you add the correct ints in your class8?
